name: Guiding Light (itch) (RedSea)
description:
In the land beneath the clouds, people squabble and war over their petty differences.
The lord has sent them their final test, and a Guiding Light to show them the way; you. 

Travel the lands rallying villagers to join your army and guide them to salvation. 

Evade and fight off corrupted spirits while maintaining a diverse group of villagers in your army to fend off all threats. 

Strength lies in differences. 

Made for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021 in 7 days using Unreal Engine 4.
